hero.name: Jônatas
hero.description: With 6 years of experience in mobile development, specialized in Flutter and native Android development, creating innovative applications and exceptional experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.heading: Transforming Ideas into Digital Solutions
about.paragraph1: With 6 years of experience in mobile development, I am proficient in Flutter to create Android and iOS applications, as well as native Android development using Java/Kotlin.
about.paragraph2: My focus is to reproduce interfaces and functionalities with precision, whether from Figma, AdobeXD or other tools. In the back-end area, I have expertise in technologies such as Node.js, Redis and Firebase.
about.paragraph3: I also work with bot development for communication platforms, automations, web scraping and artificial intelligence.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.heading: My Projects
projects.description: Check out some of the projects I've developed throughout my career

scheduling.title: Scheduling System
scheduling.description: Scheduling and booking application developed with Clojure, ClojureScript, shadow-cljs, re-frame and reagent. Reactive architecture with advanced state management and modular components.

dilemma.title: Dilemma Insights (MIT)
dilemma.description: Education platform with simulations and classroom analysis for Dilemma Insights. Modern and intuitive interface for data visualization and strategic decision making.

bots.title: Platform Bots
bots.description: Development of intelligent bots for Telegram, Discord, Slack and WhatsApp. Process automation, API integration and community management.

automation.title: Web Scraping & Automation
automation.description: Web scraping and process automation solutions. Large-scale data extraction, ETL pipelines and integration with external systems.

research.title: Scientific Research
research.institution: Using machine learning for social indicator analysis

contact.title: Contact
contact.heading: Let's Talk?
contact.description: I'm available for freelance projects and job opportunities. Get in touch and let's turn your idea into reality.

flutterPackages.title: Packages
flutterPackages.heading: Flutter Packages
flutterPackages.description: Flutter packages I developed and published on pub.dev

fluxBorders.title: Flux Borders
fluxBorders.description: A high-performance Flutter package for creating stunning, animated, and customizable borders using Fragment Shaders (GLSL). Includes 13+ unique border types ranging from classic Neon to complex effects like Fire, Liquid, and Circuit.

cleanDartGenerate.title: Clean Dart Generate
cleanDartGenerate.description: A CLI tool for generating controllers and repositories for models following Clean Dart architecture principles from Fluterando. Automates the creation of necessary folder structures and files.

imageSliderButton.title: Image Slider Button
imageSliderButton.description: A slider with images for Flutter. Customizable widget that allows creating interactive sliders with images, including callbacks for start, update, and end slide events.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
notFound.subtitle: It seems you got lost along the way. Let's help you get back!
